Description: Limestone stela of Abraham; floral pediment at the top; three lines of incised Coptic text above a cross-within-wreath.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.135, Pl.96)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: R J Moss & Co
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: I.Brit.Mus.Copt. I 96:2 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
